title: Ergomat Polyurethane Anti-Static Mat, for Dry and Non-Abrasive Areas, 2' Width x 10' Length x 0.62" Thickness, Anthracite
description: Ergomat Classic Bubble, Anti-Fatigue, anti-static mat that is ideal for dry and non-abrasive areas and where static electricity is present. Perfect for assembly and picking lines. Available in any shape or size. 8 Year warranty. Cleanroom 100/ISO Class 5.
